section.p: enables you to give a dictionary a new name.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
The dictionary from the Dictionary List window
Rename from the File menu

plentry.pd: Type a new name for the dictionary.
If you select this option, all references to the renamed dictionary are also changed.

section.title: Results
section.p: If you select Rename, the dictionary and, optionally, any references to it are renamed.
